Pasta Carbonara

Prep Time:

15min

Cooking Time:

15min

Serves:

4+

Family Rating:

5 stars

Source:

not sure

Ingredients

  • 500g Pasta (Linguini or Spaghetti)

  • 2 packets of smoked bacon lardons

  • 4 eggs

  • Cheese for later if desired

  • Salt, Pepper

Preparation

  1. Start preparing the bacon lardons in a wok or large frying pan.

  2. Boil the pasta at the same time with just enough water.

  3. Mix 2 egg yolks and 2 eggs with some salt and pepper.

  4. Once bacon is ready, turn off that hob and leave the pan on.

  5. Once the pasta is al dente, put the pot next to the pan and carry the pasta across with tongs.

  6. Drop some more water into the pan an start mixing the bacon with the pasta.

  7. Add the eggs and immediately start mixing/folding.

  8. Keep on adding water as long as the bottom of the pan is dry.

  9. Serve once no more water is being absorbed.

Tips

  • Due to the reduced amount of water, it will be very starchy and will produce a good creamy sauce.
